dict.acceptation: 上演，演出；筹办，举行；适于上演；坐公共马车旅行；
适于上演，适合在舞台上演出；乘公交车（或驿车）旅行；[军事]中间集结，扎营；

sent.orig: DisplayObject instances have a stage property that reference this Stage instance.
sent.trans: 可视对象都有一个舞台stage属性来引用舞台实例。

sent.orig: Calculation of the IAEA ADS Neutronics Benchmark (stage-1) (2D Discrete Coordinate Method)
sent.trans: IAEA中子学(stage-1)基准的计算（二维离散坐标方法）

sent.orig: The astragal putrescence may be disassembled into three stage:putrescence stage, evolve stage and resume stage.
sent.trans: 结论距骨缺血坏死可分为坏死期、进展期及修复期，坏死期极少见，而以进展期及修复期最多。

sent.orig: According to traditional differentiation, there are three cooling stages: vapor stage, boiling stage and convective stage.
sent.trans: 一般认为，在液态介质中淬火冷却，工件的散热方式分为三个阶段：蒸汽膜阶段、沸腾阶段和对流阶段。

sent.orig: The process of elongated growth of internodes is divided into three stages: stage, stage peak stage.
sent.trans: 节间的伸长生长过程分为：初期、上升期、盛期，节间在迅速达到一定长度后便不再伸长。
